duties_responsibilities.duty: Effectively interact and communicate with peer to Director-level IT professionals
Work closely with Security and Technology Services staff as needed
Identify, communicate and implement process related improvements
Collaborate extensively with peers and management to resolve collection issues and improve collections team effectiveness
Manage the resolution of collection accounts, taking into consideration time constraints due to expiration of liens within IT systems
Troubleshoot and recommend solutions and/or enhancements for collections data
Recommend new reports for success of the team through tax systems
Maintain familiarity with current computer systems and perform detailed account reviews
Adhere to corporate information security guidelines
Perform other duties and special projects as assigned pertaining to tax systems

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, IT, or a related field (Master's preferred)
